gpt-message.content: You are an expert in hardware design with a deep understanding of Verilog RTL codes. And I want you to help me process the raw data, transforming it into suitable formats that can serve as inputs and outputs for the model.

Verilog code should look like regular programming code with specific keywords like "module", "endmodule", "input", "output", "wire", etc. The given code does not contain these elements, which makes me believe that there was some error during translation or transmission of this code.

Please provide valid Verilog RTL code so I can provide the information you are asking for.
